metadata.name: MARIO
metadata.description:
Pierre Gervois, MARIO (2022), JPEG image, 14816 × 2822 pixels, 1/1.

MARIO was part of the April 2022 exhibition “Poem = Work of Art” at the Francisco Carolinum Museum (Linz, Austria), presented in the Cryptovoxels Metaverse and curated by The VerseVerse. It has also been presented on August 6th, 2022 at the VerseVerse X SuperRare exhibition at the SuperRare gallery in SoHo, NYC. 

MARIO was featured in the leading crypto art publication The Tickle, Issue #30, January 28th, 2022.
